description:
After strengthening his relationship wtih Licorice, Pas works on securing both sugar and goat`s milk for his future land of sweets. Meanwhile, there are stirrings of war at the border...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai no Ringo to Kanashiki Sen`un
Apples of Love and Sad Threats of War
愛の林檎と悲しき戦雲
